Activity: Log in and finalize bug report templates based on feedback received.
Prepare training materials to help team members understand how to use the bug tracking tool and report bugs efficiently.
Schedule a training session for team members on reporting bugs and using the bug tracking tool effectively.
Conduct the training session, guiding team members through the process of logging bugs using the new templates and tool.
Gather feedback from the training session participants and make a note of any questions or concerns.
